Model.Project

Class TheDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Project.TheDate

  • public class TheDate
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a date class, which use the following date format dd/MM/yyyy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constuctor to create a date instance with given arguments.
      TheDate(java.lang.String stringDate)
      Constructor for the date that accepts a string representation of the date.

        month - The month of the date.
        year - The year of the date.

        Parameters:
        stringDate - String representation of the date. (dd/MM/yyyy)
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - The given string date cannot be parsed to a date.
